manipulations.insert_object: Add a large, ornate golden statue behind the group, casting a dramatic shadow.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the bicycle leaning against the tree on the left side of the image.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the background with a vibrant, photorealistic cityscape at sunset, ensuring proper lighting.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rain to the scene with visible droplets and reflections on the ground, blurring distant figures.
manipulations.physics_event: Add a flock of pigeons taking flight from behind the central woman, slightly blurring the motion.
